name: Bardic Inspiration
rules: Choose a creature within 60 feet that can see or hear you; it gains one Bardic Inspiration die.
Within the next hour, when the creature fails a d20 test, it can roll the die and add the result to the d20.
limits: A creature can have only one Bardic Inspiration die at a time.
Uses equal your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1); regain all uses on a long rest.
The die scales to d8 at level 5, d10 at level 10, and d12 at level 15 (see class table).
